Mass shootings are unheard of in Denmark. Gunshot wounds are rare. Gun regulation laws are very strict. I am a trauma surgeon. In 7 years I have operated one gunshot wound in Denmark. I find it hard to believe that restricting access to guns will not save lives. #ThisisMyLane
